channel.title: Photography on Suburban Nerd
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on Suburban Nerd

item.title: iPhone 3GS series from Aker Brygge
item.description: Glass Construction by Marcus Ramberg. Went for a quick bike ride near Aker Brygge this morning and tested the iPhone 3GS camera. I'd like a tripod mount so I can film from the bike with it. Will test out with the gorillapod and my flip mino hd. Update: The first set I published was post-processed using adobe lightroom to give them a mood I like. For reference, I've uploaded the non-postprocessed versions as well

item.title: Baklia Night Sky
item.description: Baklia Night Sky by Marcus Ramberg Took this before going to bed late last night.

item.title: Robots!
item.description: I know I just posted about the big picture's carnival photos, but I can't resist linking to this post as well. Robots are just so awesome! I want the Tuba playing one.

item.title: Carnivals around the world
item.description: These awesome, burlesque pictures from Big Picture makes me want to order a plane ride to Brazil right now. They just don't celebrate things that way around here.

item.title: Prettify your flickr stream with «I Hardly Knew Her»
item.description: I have to say, I think this alternative flickr interface is just great. It gives focus to the photos, while providing exactly enough metadata (hint: click the picture to view large version). I've linked up my flickr stream here, to see your own, just change the username in the url.
